subject: code analysis and uni testing tools
msgSnippet: Hi, I am looking for information on integrated code anlaysis and unit testing tools for Java. Has anybody good and bad experiences to share? In particular, I
messageBody:
Hi,

I am looking for information on integrated code anlaysis and unit
testing tools for Java. Has anybody good and bad experiences to share?

In particular, I have been evaluating JTest from ParaSoft (
http://www.parasoft.com/products/index.htm ) and it seems a good
product which has the advantages of integrating static analysis,
automatic and user defined test cases, external JUnit test classes and
code coverage. Has anybody experience in using JTest (or a similar
tool) in his development team?

Thanks,
Joel.
--
Joel Feraud
Java Management Developer
Sun Microsystems, Inc.
07, chemin du Vieux Chene
38240 MEYLAN, France
Tel: +33 476 188 325
